page.title: 09HOUSING - OLD KILPATRICK
page.content:
VILLAGERS WERE ASKED IF THEY WOULD LIKE ANY IMPROVEMENTS MADE REGARDING HOUSING. HERE ARE THEIR COMMENTS.
More houses needed, especially pensioners houses.
I feel happy with the high standard of housing in the area.It has been well planned in the past,and is therefore essential that this standard be maintained in the future.
There should be less delay in the reallocation of council housing which leads to so much loss of revenue to the local authority.
OF THE 30 PEOPLE INTERVIEWED, MOST FELT A NEED FOR MORE HOUSING; ONLY 2 INDICATED THAT THEY DID NOT LIKE THEIR HOUSE.
